alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:01AM CDT until April 05 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL ROCK ISLAND...SOUTHWESTERN WHITESIDE AND HENRY COUNTIES... At 501 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fenton to near Bishop Hill, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Prophetstown, Fenton, Hamilton Corners, Denrock, Prophetstown State Recreation Area and Portland Corners around 505 AM CDT. Lyndon and Kewanee Municipal Airport around 510 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Kewanee. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
